text: @radionz Medical evidence shows that #schools could have remained open & had little-to-no effect on the number of infections or deaths. So, who has been advising the government & why didn’t she follow that advice? #COVIDー19 #JacindaGate #JacindaArdern #COVIDー19 #COVIDIOTS #coronavirus
